00042 class idelivery_token : public virtual itoken
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     typedef std::shared_ptr<idelivery_token> ptr_t;
00050     virtual message_ptr get_message() const =0;          
00051 };
00052 
00053 typedef idelivery_token::ptr_t idelivery_token_ptr;

00062 class delivery_token : public virtual idelivery_token,
00063                         public token
00064 {
00066     message_ptr msg_;
00067 
00069     friend class async_client;
00070 
00075     void set_message(message_ptr msg) { msg_ = msg; }
00076 
00077 public:
00081     typedef std::shared_ptr<delivery_token> ptr_t;
00082 
00083     delivery_token(iasync_client& cli) : token(cli) {}
00084 
00085     delivery_token(iasync_client& cli, const std::string& topic) : token(cli, topic) {}
00086 
00087     delivery_token(iasync_client& cli, const std::vector<std::string>& topics) 
00088                     : token(cli, topics) {}
00089 
00090     //delivery_token(const std::string& logContext);
00091 
00096     virtual message_ptr get_message() const { return msg_; }
00097 };
00098 
00102 typedef delivery_token::ptr_t delivery_token_ptr;
